channel.title: Roidboiz
channel.description:
# Roidboiz
![image|500x500](upload://stclbf3kPMLXBCFqR5xhf3eApbv.jpeg)
>9,936 unique Roidboiz loyal to DogeCube, the original Radix memecoin. They are the first of the Gangs of Radix, and occupy the farthest shards of the 2^256 Radix Shardspace. The official website with more information will be launched later in Q1 2022. >In the meantime we are running a Pre-launch Sale: - 10% of Supply Available (993 Roidboiz) - Price: 100XRD or 200,000DGC (Max 25 Roidz per wallet for pre-launch) DGC price will only be available for 993 Roidboiz, including pre launch sales. Price after official launch: 200XRD or 400,000DGC. >The Roidboiz were inspired by the DogeCube Meme Brawls. They are hand sketched and digitally optimised using a combination of Procreate and Photoshop. **Price of each NFT:** PRESALE: 100 XRD / 200,000 DGC **Links:** * [Website](https://roidboiz.io) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/roidboiz) * [Telegram](http://t.me/roidboiz)

item.title: Roidboiz
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Roidboiz

9,936 unique Roidboiz loyal to DogeCube, the original Radix memecoin. They are the first of the Gangs of Radix, and occupy the farthest shards of the 2^256 Radix Shardspace.
The official website with more information will be launched later in Q1 2022.

In the meantime we are running a Pre-launch Sale: - 10% of Supply Available (993 Roidboiz) - Price: 100XRD or 200,000DGC (Max 25 Roidz per wallet for pre-launch)
DGC price will only be available for 993 Roidboiz, including pre launch sales. Price after official launch: 200XRD or 400,000DGC.

The Roidboiz were inspired by the DogeCube Meme Brawls. They are hand sketched and digitally optimised using a combination of Procreate and Photoshop.

Price of each NFT: PRESALE: 100 XRD / 200,000 DGC

Links:

  • Website

Social:

  • Twitter
  • Telegram
